Header: Railway security officers to be deployed in civvies
Content: Minister of Transport, Nimal Siripala de Silva says Railway security officers will be deployed inside trains in civvies to prevent destructive activities in trains. He said if caught the passengers will be taken action using the Public Properties Act. A train fitted with locally manufactured compartments was added to the fleet and the Minister said this joining the inaugural journey of the train at the Fort Railway Station this morning (Jul 02).
